entry.title: FROST ADVISORY, Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:27 p.m. EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 5.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 7:00 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 5.7°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 54 %

Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low zero with patchy frost. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low zero with patchy frost. Forecast issued 5:20 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with showers. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:20 PM EDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost.
